title 15-delete_account-basic 
actor "Administrator" as u
image data:image/png;base64, "Web Browser" as w
boundary "<link:_>newView : View " as nv
boundary "<link:_>: DispatchServlet" as d
entity "<link:_>m : Model" as m

control "<link:_>: AccountSystem" as ac

participant "<link:_>: CustomerRepository" as cr
participant "<link:_>: AdminRepository" as ar
participant "<link:_>: OrganizerRepository" as or
participant "<link:_>: AccountService" as as
entity "<link:_>: Account" as a

==1. The administrator selects an account to delete on view all accounts page(7-view_all_accounts.png).\n2.The system asks the administrator to confirm.\n3. The administrator selects **Yes**.==


u -> w: click()
activate w

w->d:POST(url : String, data : JSON)
activate d

d->ac:deleteAccount(accountId : Long, m : Model)
activate ac

ac -> as: getAccount(email : String)
activate as
as->cr:a := findByEmail(email : String)
alt the value of a is null
  as->ar:a := findByEmail(email : String)
end
alt the value of a is null
  as->or:a := findByEmail(email : String)
end
as-->ac:return a
deactivate as

ac -> as: deleteAccount(a : Account)
activate as
alt the account is a customer
  as->cr:deleteCustomer(a : Customer)
else the account is an administrator
  as->ar:deleteAdministrator(a : Administrator)
else the account is an organizer
  as->or:deleteOrganizer(a : Organizer)
end
as->a:<<disable>>
destroy a
as-->ac:
deactivate as
alt the account is a customer
ac -> as: getCustomerAccounts()
else the account is a administrator
ac -> as:getAdministratorAccounts()
else the account is a organizer
ac -> as:getOrganizerAccounts()
end
alt the account is Customer
activate as
  as->cr:allaccounts：=findAll()
  as-->ac: return customerAccounts
else the account is Administrator
as->ar:allaccounts：=findAll()
as-->ac: return administratorAccounts
else the account is Organizer
as->or:allaccounts：=findAll()
as-->ac: return organizerAccounts

end

deactivate as
alt the class of allAccounts is Administrator[*]
ac->m: addAttribute("accounts" : String, administratorAccounts : Administrator[*])
ac-->d:return "view_all_accounts_administrator"

else the class of allAccounts is Customer[*]
ac->m: addAttribute("accounts" : String, customerAccounts : Customer[*])
ac-->d:return "view_all_accounts_customer"
else the class of allAccounts is Organiser[*]
ac->m: addAttribute("accounts" : String, organizerAccounts : Organiser[*])
ac-->d:return "view_all_accounts_organizer"
end


deactivate ac
d->*nv:View(model : Model)
activate nv


nv-->d:
deactivate nv

d-->w:return newView
deactivate d

==4. The system update the view all accounts page(7-view_all_accounts.png) with this account deleted.==
